abstract: But Glass Lewis backs the software company’s slate for the board as the annual meeting approaches.
snippet: But Glass Lewis backs the software company’s slate for the board as the annual meeting approaches.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn’s slate of candidates for the board of Mentor Graphics has received support from the influential proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services.

headline.main: Icahn Gets Backing From I.S.S. on Mentor Graphics
